General_Description: '''Odor in the Court''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''The [[Seaman's Judicial Court]] in the [[Port of Piraeus]] is the place where disputes on the open waters are settled. There is something fishy going on amongst the mess of records, and that is where you will find me.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the treasure.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
